meanings.definition: The art of interpreting music through bodily movement.
meanings.sent1: She performed a beautiful eurythmy to the classical music.
meanings.sent2: The dancers moved in perfect eurythmy with the rhythm of the song.
meanings.sent3: During the talent show, his eurythmy made everyone smile.
meanings.sent4: Her eurythmy was like a graceful swan gliding across the stage.
meanings.sent5: The eurythmy of the performers painted a vivid picture of the music.

meanings.definition: Harmonious bodily movement, especially in dance.
meanings.sent1: The synchronized swimmers displayed incredible eurythmy in the water.
meanings.sent2: The ballet dancers moved with precision and eurythmy on stage.
meanings.sent3: The eurythmy of the yoga class brought a sense of peace to the room.
meanings.sent4: His eurythmy on the soccer field was like poetry in motion.
meanings.sent5: The eurythmy of the acrobats left the audience in awe.
